overview: The film tells about a small museum, where the economic boom has not yet arrived. It appears as if time has stopped in this national museum, a museum which should serve as a show window for Slovakia. Stuffed animals are covered with dust and the three employees working as caretakers of the huge building look like the museum exhibits themselves.
tagline: The film tells about a small museum, where the economic boom has not yet arrived.  Stuffed animals are covered with dust and the three employees working as caretakers of the huge building look like the museum exhibits themselves.
title: The Exhibition
